(5/10) }} 'Atomic' is Lit's third album, released on October
16, 2001. It peaked at #36 on the Billboard 200.

"Happy in the Meantime" is located on the soundtrack for [[Mr. Deeds]] and is
played as the credits roll.

"Over My Head" was originally featured in the soundtrack for the 2000 animated
Science Fiction film Titan AE.

"The Last Time Again" was featured in the final credits of the 2001 film
American Pie 2, but is mistakenly listed as "Last Time Again."
